divs: sighting detailsi can't remember every details, because it happend a very long time ago in the 70's. i was about 8 or 9 years old at that event and i couldn't remember this until the memories suddenly popped into my head when i was about 16. it was about noon (12 o'clock) after school on saturday (in the 70's we had school on saturday too). i remember exactly that it was saturday, because only on saturdays we had school only in the morning. there were dozens of children and parents on the street (in the 10th district of budapest, called "k���b���nya" in the building estate "���jhegyi lak���telep"). i was playing around on the ground with some stones, drawing something on the sidewalk, when i heard a really loud, continous rumbling from the sky. i looked up but at first i couldn't see anything, just the multi-story buildings (with 10 floors). then a huge flying object appeared above and from behind the building which was in front of me. i think, the object was flying maybe 10-20 meters above the house (so about 30-50 meters above the ground... remember, i was very young, so i only knew, it almost touched the roof of the building) and it covered the sky almost completely. it flew very slow and it was very loud. everybody looked up and the street was like paralized. nobody moved, just looked at the flying object. i think it lasted about 10 minutes to disappear behind the other houses. as i said, i couldn't remember this until i grew up, but i can remember that i always dreamed about similar scenes since i was very young... almost every night for years. when i grew up, suddenly i remembered the whole event, except the shape and color of the object. when i told the whole story to a friend (who was my class mate since 2nd class), telling them that i remember this since a short time again, he replied: "i can remember this. i was there. it was green and had a shape of a triangle." so if, somebody reads this and can remember the event, because he\she was there, please contact me at a.beke@chello.at
Object Features: Dome, Window(s), Patterned Surface, Appendage(s), Louvres, Other
Summary: Huge UFO flying above our heads very slowly
